channel.title: NEED HELP! XP rates on Disturbed source! (matrix)
channel.description:
Hi, I do not know how to change the xp rates on my source. The only place I can find to change the xp rates are in my Setting.java
Example:
public static final int XP_RATE = 1000; // x75 for combat, x50 for skills public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 1500; public static final int COMBAT_RATE = 2500;
If someone would let me know how to do this that would be awesome. Thankyou.

item.title: NEED HELP! XP rates on Disturbed source! (matrix)
item.dc:creator: @svrking27 svrking27
item.description:
@svrking27 wrote:

Hey guys,
Alot of people seem to not know how to do this, even though its fairly easy fix.
Im new to java, so correct if anything can be made better, but here goes:

  1. Go to skills.java and find
    Code:
    public void addXp(int skill, double exp)
  2. then scroll down to
    Quote:
    if (player.getAuraManager().usingWisdom())
    exp *= 1.025;
    Below it, add:
    Code:
    if (skill != PRAYER)
    exp *= 75;
    Then, replace 75 with any number (higher the number, the more exp gained…)

What this does:
-The code you just added, will multiply exp gain by # you replaced 75 with, for all skills EXCEPT prayer, if you want to add more skills that exp will not increase by this number, replace " if (skill != PRAYER)" with:

Code:
if (skill != PRAYER && skill !=SKILLNAMEHERE)
Replace “SKILLNAMEHERE” with an actual skill name… and there ya go…

Read full topic

Example:

public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 1500;
public static final int COMBAT_RATE = 2500;

If someone would let me know how to do this that would be awesome.
Thankyou.
